mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_time ( province_name, city, screen_name, title, show_date, show_time ) VALUES ( #{provinceName}, #{city}, #{screenName}, #{title}, #{showDate}, #{showTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT time_no, province_name, city, screen_name, title, show_date, show_time FROM movie_time WHERE time_no = #{timeNo}
SELECT time_no, province_name, city, screen_name, title, show_date, show_time FROM movie_time ORDER BY show_date ASC, show_time ASC
SELECT screen_name AS value, screen_name AS label FROM movie_screen WHERE city = #{city}
SELECT title AS value, title AS label FROM movie
